'''Chise''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Octave of the Maushiro}}.

After the completion of {{Quest|Through the Mists}}, he appears as a spirit at the southwest of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]].
